content.question: Which of the following best describes the moral positions regarding industrialization expressed by each of the two sources?

choices.label: The medical examiners see industrialization as unjustly oppressing and harming the workers, while Smiles sees it as uplifting the nation and its people.
The medical examiners see industrialization as uplifting the nation and its people, while Smiles sees it as unjustly oppressing and harming the workers.
The medical examiners and Smiles both see industrialization as causing moral harm to the nation.
The medical examiners and Smiles both see industrialization as improving the morality of the nation.

content.answer: The medical examiners see industrialization as unjustly oppressing and harming the workers, while Smiles sees it as uplifting the nation and its people.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
